command.text: select "Agency"."AgencyId" "AgencyID" ,"Agency"."AgencyNumber" "AgencyNumber" ,"Agency"."ContactName" "ContactName" ,"Agency"."ContactInfo" "ContactInfo" ,"Address"."Address1" "Address1" ,"Agency"."Website" "Website" ,"Agency"."UserName" "UserName" ,"Agency"."Password" "Password" ,"Agency"."AgencyLevel" "AgencyLevel" ,"Agency"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"Agency"."CreationDate" "CreationDate" ,"Agency"."ModificationDate" "ModificationDate" ,"Agency"."AddressId" "AddressID" ,"Agency"."FacilityID" "FacilityID" ,"Facility"."FacilityName" "FacilityName" ,"FacilityOrg"."OrgName1" "FacilityOrgName1" from "core"."Agency" "Agency" left join "core"."Address" "Address" on "Agency"."AddressId" = "Address"."AddressID" left join "core"."Facility" "Facility" on "Agency"."FacilityID" = "Facility"."FacilityID" left join "core"."Organization" "FacilityOrg" on "Facility"."OrgID" = "FacilityOrg"."OrgID"

select "Facility"."FacilityID" "FacilityID" ,"Facility"."FacilityName" "FacilityName" ,"Facility"."BusinessUnit" "BusinessUnit" ,"Facility"."CreationDate" "CreationDate" ,"Facility"."ActivationDate" "ActivationDate" ,"Facility"."InactiveDate" "InactiveDate" ,"Facility"."DBAName" "Dbaname" ,"Facility"."Contact" "Contact" ,"Address"."Address1" "Address1" ,"Org"."OrgName1" "OrgName1" from "core"."Facility" "Facility" left join "core"."Address" "Address" on "Facility"."AddressID" = "Address"."AddressID" left join "core"."Organization" "Org" on "Facility"."OrgID" = "Org"."OrgID"

select "People"."PersonId" "PersonID" ,"People"."FirstName" "FirstName" ,"People"."MiddleName" "MiddleName" ,"People"."LastName" "LastName" ,"People"."LastName2" "LastName2" ,"People"."AliasName" "AliasName" ,"PersonType"."TypeName" "PersonTypeName" ,"Position"."PositionName" "PositionName" ,"Manager"."FirstName" "ManagerFirstName" ,"Facility"."FacilityName" "FacilityName" ,"Organization"."OrgName1" "OrganizationOrgName1" ,"Organization"."EIN" "OrganizationEin" ,"People"."Salary" "Salary" ,"People"."SalaryPeriod" "SalaryPeriod" ,"SalaryPeriod"."Period" "Period" ,"Communication"."Phone" "CommunicationPhone" ,"Communication"."PhoneType" "CommunicationPhoneType" ,"Communication"."email" "CommunicationEmail" ,"People"."EmergencyContactPersonName" "EmergencyContactPersonName" ,"People"."EmergencyContactPersonRelation" "EmergencyContactPersonRelation" ,"People"."EmergencyContactPersonPhone" "EmergencyContactPersonPhone" ,"Address"."Address1" "Address1" ,"Department"."DeptName" "DepartmentDeptName" ,"People"."PositionID" "PositionID" ,"People"."CommunicationID" "CommunicationID" ,"People"."FacilityID" "FacilityID" ,"People"."AddressID" "AddressID" ,"People"."PersonTypeId" "PersonTypeId" ,"People"."DepartmentId" "DepartmentId" ,"People"."ManagerID" "ManagerID" from "core"."People" "People" left join "core"."OrgPositions" "Position" on "People"."PositionID" = "Position"."PositionID" left join "core"."People" "Manager" on "People"."ManagerID" = "Manager"."PersonId" and "People"."SalaryPeriod" = "Manager"."PositionID" left join "core"."Communication" "Communication" on "People"."CommunicationID" = "Communication"."CommunicationID" left join "core"."Facility" "Facility" on "People"."FacilityID" = "Facility"."FacilityID" left join "core"."Organization" "Organization" on "Facility"."OrgID" = "Organization"."OrgID" left join "core"."Address" "Address" on "People"."AddressID" = "Address"."AddressID" left join "core"."PersonType" "PersonType" on "People"."PersonTypeId" = "PersonType"."TypeId" left join "core"."Department" "Department" on "People"."DepartmentId" = "Department"."DeptId" left join "core"."SalaryPeriod" "SalaryPeriod" on "People"."SalaryPeriod" = "SalaryPeriod"."Id"
